##Linear Regression

##SetUp

```{r}
data(cars) 
speed <- cars$speed
dist <- cars$dist
```

##Design Matrix and response variable

```{r}
X <- cbind(1,speed) 
Y<-dist
```

##Beta Estimate

```{r}
#| label: Beta hat
Xtrans <- t(X) 
XtransX <- Xtrans %*% X 
XtransX_inv <- solve(XtransX) 
XtransY <- Xtrans %*% Y 
beta_estimate <- XtransX_inv %*% XtransY
beta_estimate
```

##Linear Model

```{r}
model <- lm(dist ~ speed, data=cars) 
summary(model)
```
